column4: analyst comments) March 30 Memory-chip maker Micron Technology Inc  reported a 29.6  percent fall in quarterly net sales as weak demand for personal computers led to a fall in average selling prices for chips used in PCs.UPDATE 2-Chipmaker Micron forecasts Q3 loss but sees improvement later in 2016 * 2nd-qtr adj loss per share $0.05 vs est $0.08   (Recasts with outlook; adds details

column2: Pepsi reshuffles North America top managementUPDATE 1-Pepsi reshuffles North America top management March 30 PepsiCo Inc promoted the head of its North America beverages business to chief executive for the region and said the head of its Frito-Lay snacks business there was leaving the company.  UPDATE 1-Pepsi reshuffles North America top management March 30 PepsiCo Inc promoted the head of its North America beverages business to chief executive for the region and said the head of its Frito-Lay snacks business there was leaving the company. March 30 PepsiCo Inc said Al Carey
column3: the head of its North America beverages business
column4: has been appointed chief executive of the region and will oversee the company's beverages
column5: Frito-Lay and Quaker Foods divisions there.UPDATE 1-Pepsi reshuffles North America top management March 30 PepsiCo Inc promoted the head of its North America beverages business to chief executive for the region and said the head of its Frito-Lay snacks business there was leaving the company.

column2: Yahoo to allow proxy access for board nominations March 30 Yahoo Inc will allow investors who have held stake of at least 3 percent in the struggling Internet company for a minimum of three years to nominate directors to its board.
